Package etomica.config

Class ConformationChainZigZag

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.config.ConformationChain
      • etomica.config.ConformationChainZigZag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConformationHexane

    public class ConformationChainZigZag
extends ConformationChain
    Takes two vectors, and returns them in repeating order to form a zig-zag chain molecule.
    See Also:
